title: NFC Validation Request
description: Validating NFC card containing account tokens to be validated.

traceId.description: An unique message identifier - UUID v4

eventTimestamp.description: Timestamp for the time the travelcard was read. UTC in RFC3339 format.

deviceId.description: Unique device identifier. Unique for local system (in bus)

token.description: Base64 URL (without padding) encoded token. Only present if the device is able to read token directly (has access keys)

travelCardNumber.description: Serial number for travel card, 1-10 digits as string.

cardContent.description: Set of applications with file contents for smart card content dump when available. This can be available in some cases after a APDU command subprocess.

appId.description: Unique ID representing the application on smart card

files.description: All dumped files with content for application on smart card

fileNumber.description: File number for specific file in an application

content.description: File content in hex starting with 0x.
